devdoc.author: Wafa AlDamegh.

addAdmin(address).details: market owner allowed to add a new admin

addProduct(uint256,string,uint256,uint25.details: Store owner allowed to add a new product to their store front

addStoreOwner(address).details: admin allowed to add a new store owner

addressType().details: returns the type of address (market owner, admin, store owner, or shopper)

approveStoreFront(uint256).details: admin can approve created store front

changeMarketState(bool).details: market owner allowed to chainge marketplace state

createStoreFront(string).details: store owner allowed to add a new store front

destroyContract().details: selfdestruct the contract to destroy the contract in case of bugs

getMarketState().details: returns the current state of marketplace

getNumberOfAdmins().details: returns the number of active admins

getNumberOfStoreOwners().details: returns the number of active store owners

getProductCount().details: return total number of product in the market

getStoreFrontByStoreOwner().details: return store front by store owner address

getStoreFrontCount().details: return total number of store fronts

getStoreOwnerByStoreFront(uint256).details: return store owner address of the store front

getTotalProducts(uint256).details: return total number of products in the store front

isAdmin(address).details: returns (true) if the address is an admin, otherwise returns (false)

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

isStoreOwner(address).details: returns (true) if the address is store owner, otherwise returns (false)

purchaseProduct(uint256,uint256).details: Shopper allowed to purchase a product

removeAdmin(address).details: market owner allowed to remove an admin

removeProduct(uint256,uint256).details: Store owner allowed to remove product

removeStoreOwner(address).details: admin allowed to remove a store owner

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

updateProductPrice(uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Store owner allowed to update product price

withdraw(uint256).details: Store owner can withdraw balance from their store fronts

devdoc.title: MarketPlace: a simple smart contract for a market place on Ethereum.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

userdoc.notice: Final project for ConsenSys Academy's Developer Bootcamp 2019.
